channel.title: Where am I missing a Brace?

item.title: Where am I missing a Brace?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:397294”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=494445.msg3614801#msg3614801 date=1306881625]

boolean hasItems = playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 4);Checks to see if the player has the runes.

Checking to see if the player has that level.

Ok, if I do hasLevel in other codes will it still mean playerLevel[6] >= 94; ?

If it does I’ll change the boolean names :o
[/quote]

No. It’s a local variable so that you don’t have to do

if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
    // ...
}

every time. It’s just to simplify the code a little bit.[/quote]
Thanks, that will help me when I decide to write my own codes (actually that veng code I tried :p)

Read full topic
item.source: Where am I missing a Brace?

boolean hasItems = playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 4);Checks to see if the player has the runes.

Checking to see if the player has that level.
[/quote]
Ok, if I do hasLevel in other codes will it still mean playerLevel[6] >= 94; ?

If it does I’ll change the boolean names :o[/quote]

No. It’s a local variable so that you don’t have to do

if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
    // ...
}

every time. It’s just to simplify the code a little bit.

item.title: Where am I missing a Brace?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:397294”] case 162: boolean hasItems = playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 4); boolean hasLevel = platerLevel[6] >= 94; if (hasItems) { if (hasLevel) { setAnimation(4410); txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); actionTimer = 30; inCombat(); deleteItem(557, getItemSlot(557), 10); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2); deleteItem(553, getItemSlot(553), 4); for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } else { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } break; [/quote]
Thanks, can you tell me about the boolean at the top?

Read full topic
item.source: Where am I missing a Brace?

item.title: Where am I missing a Brace?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

case 162:
    boolean hasItems = playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 4);
    boolean hasLevel = platerLevel[6] >= 94;
    if (hasItems) {
        if (hasLevel) {
            setAnimation(4410);    
            txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!";
            attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
            actionTimer = 30;
            inCombat();
            deleteItem(557, getItemSlot(557), 10);
            deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
            deleteItem(553, getItemSlot(553), 4);
            for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
                cba = abc / 10;
                abc2 = cba * 2;
                if (abc2 <= 1) {  
                    abc2 = 2;
                }
            }
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }
        else {
            sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
        }
    }
    else {
        sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
    }
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Where am I missing a Brace?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Well I wrote this code up and of course I got the famous 100 errors. Can’t seem to find where a missing } or { is.

case 162:
			if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
                    if ((playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) == false)
                            || (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) == false)
                            || (playerHasItemAmount(553, 4) == false)) {
                        sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
		} else if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
			if ((playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) == true)
                            || (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) == true)
                            || (playerHasItemAmount(553, 4) == true)) {
				setAnimation(4410);    
                            	txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!";
				attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
                            	actionTimer = 30;
				inCombat();
				deleteItem(557, getItemSlot(557), 10); 
                        	deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2); 
                        	deleteItem(553, getItemSlot(553), 4); 
				for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {}
                                for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
                                cba = abc / 10;
                                abc2 = cba * 2;
                                if (abc2 <= 1) {  
                                    abc2 = 2;
                                }
                                        updateRequired = true;
                                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
                    sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
                }
		}
			break;

Read full topic
